Sentencas: The present paper describes the fabrication and performance of a molybdenum dioxide (MoO2)-based anode for liquid hydrocarbon/oxygenated hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: These fuel cells first internally reform the complex liquid fuel into carbon fragments and hydrogen, which are then electrochemically oxidized to produce electrical energy without external fuel processors.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The MoO2-based anode was fabricated on to an yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte via combined electrostatic spray deposition (ESD) and direct painting methods.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The cell performance was measured by directly feeding liquid fuels such as n-dodecane (i.e., a model diesel/kerosene fuel) or biodiesel (i.e., a future biomass-based liquid fuel) to the MoO2-based anode at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The maximum initial power densities obtained from our MoO2-based SOFC were 34 mW cm(-2) and 45 mW cm(-2) using n-dodecane and biodiesel, respectively.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The initial power density of the MoO2-based SOFC was improved up to 2500 mW cm(-2) by optimizing the porosity of the MoO2-based anode.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: To test the long-term stability of the MoO2-based anode SOFC against coking, n-dodecane was continuously fed into the cell for 24 h at the open circuit voltage (OCV).
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: During long-term testing, voltage-current density (V-I) plots were periodically obtained and they showed no significant changes over the operation time.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Microstructural examination of the tested cells indicated that the MoO2-based anode displayed negligible coke formation, which explains its stability.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: On the other hand, SOFCs with conventional nickel (Ni)-based anodes under the same operating conditions showed a significant amount of coke formation on the metal surface, which led to a rapid drop in cell performance.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Hence, the present work demonstrates that MoO2-based anodes exhibit outstanding tolerance to coke formation.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: This result opens up the opportunity for more efficiently generating electrical energy from both existing transportation and next generation biomassderived liquid fuels using liquid hydrocarbon/oxygenated hydrocarbon-fueled SOFCs.
Titulo: Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications
Molybdenum dioxide-based anode for solid oxide fuel cell applications
